by_patient.index: function (doc){if(doc.type!='Patient'){return null;}var facilityId='missing';var personId='missing';var motechId='missing';if('facilityId' in doc&&doc.facilityId){facilityId=doc.facilityId;}if('personId' in doc&&doc.personId){personId=doc.personId;}if('motechId' in doc&&doc.motechId){motechId=doc.motechId;}var ret=new Document();ret.add(facilityId,{type:'string',field:'facilityId'});ret.add(personId,{type:'string',field:'personId'});ret.add(motechId,{type:'string',field:'motechId'});return ret;}
